scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:api" "pnpm run dev:web" "pnpm run dev:infra"
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && export PATH="/Users/wesoftyou/.local/bin:$PATH" && poetry run uvicorn app.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload
